author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Drywall replacement tips…I used a 1-inch Forstner bit for the 1/2 inch copper pipes and 2 inch hole saw for the 1-1/2 inch drain. For some reason I couldn’t find my spade bits but the Forstner worked perfectly. The rasp is great for fine tuning drywall panels 🔥#drywall #drywallrepair #diy #homerepairtutor
title: Drywall Replacement Tips - #shorts #drywall #homerepairtutor
